text: Stephen Lee (November 11, 1955 â€“ August 14, 2014) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in La Bamba, Dolls, WarGames, RoboCop 2, and in The Negotiator. He was born in Englewood, New Jersey. Lee died of a heart attack in Los Angeles, California, aged 58.Variety, Stephen Lee, Character Actor in 'Burlesque,' 'The Negotiator,' Dies at 58 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from Kansas City, Missouri Category:People from Englewood, New Jersey
title: Stephen Lee (actor)
